title: Sobre mim

ğŸ‘‹ğŸ‘‹ğŸ‘‹ OlÃ¡, sou Filomena F. J. Pitra,
Sou MÃ©dica Interna em Imagiologia, com conhecimentos e competÃªncias para abordar pacientes com diversas patologias e realizar tÃ©cnicas de diagnÃ³stico e tratamento, tanto de menor quanto de maior complexidade, seja em carÃ¡ter eletivo ou de urgÃªncia, em regime de ambulatÃ³rio ou hospitalar. ::: {#edu-exp} :::
I am currently working as a consultant in Biostatistics in the field of genetics, i.e., proteomics, metabolomics, transcriptomics, etc. in Lille & Paris, France.
Additionally, I am also a freelance, available for hire to work on {{< iconify fa6-brands:r-project >}} and Quarto related projects.
I have developed a few {{< iconify fa6-brands:r-project >}}Â packages (e.g.,Â insane, NACHO), and although some are not very useful, they are most definitely entertaining (i.e.,Â ggpacman).
I also enjoy watching movies () and playing with {{< iconify fa6-brands:r-project >}} (github.com/mcanouil/imdb-ratings).
Have a look at my complete {{< iconify fa6-regular file-lines >}} curriculum vitae.
